name: Jumpys
description: In a land a lot like ours pigs and wolfs fight for survival, while the pigs live happily in the green springful land the wolfs are cured to live in the dead dry rocky "Dreadland" the way you protect you lands from the wolfs is to jump on the tiny heads but be careful the wolfs will do the same to make you the next dinner move using the instructions given at the start of the game and have fun. The bashful pigs move via w for jump and ad for left and right. The weary wolfs move via the up arrow to jump and the left and right arrow to move left and right and shift to bring a great dash forward.
